thread.section_title: Kiwi Sheepskins Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiwi Sheepskins | kiwisheepskins.com
thread.title: Gary

author: Gary
title: Gary
text: I emailed Kiwi Sheepskins regarding a problem with a 4 year old pair of house boots. The problem included foot discomfort related to nerve damage from rheumatoid arthritis. A gentleman from Kiwi responded within hours, and guided me toward the right sized product to resolve my issues. Better still, he personally selected a pair from inventory to suit my particular concerns. Undoubtedly, Kiwi understands the value in matching their customers with a product that will enhance overall satisfaction. I will return to Kiwi for future purchases.
